body: I would like to see Nami saga 4 or another one piece character.
We want to see Nami SAGA 4 in color and it will be much better if Nico Robin joined with Nami in the fourth part. It will be a great story and I hope to reply from you
When will Nami SAGA 4 color be published? We are looking forward to seeing it and please respond quickly
